title: Echopet这个宠物插件生成问题
author: 卜世超
txt_content:
求大佬帮我解答
末影龙怎么让他生成，输入pet enderdragon召唤末影龙
这个插件配置禁止生成，能配置让他生成吗？
配置哪个文件生成，谢谢大佬们了

replies.author: 梦落老司机
replies.txt_content:
如果配置文件有禁止的话肯定会有打开的233
这个插件没用过
有没有什么spawndragon这样的:false这样的 改成true233
反正个人理念

replies.author: 董事长
replies.txt_content: 配置文件可以发一下吗

replies.author: 卜世超
replies.txt_content:
董事长 发表于 2020-4-10 01:22
配置文件可以发一下吗
# +----------------------------------------------------+
# <                 EchoPet By DSH105                  >
# <               ---------------------                >
# <            Configuration for EchoPet 2             >
# <   See the EchoPet Wiki before editing this file    >
# +----------------------------------------------------+

commandString: pet

# If set to true, EchoPet will automatically download and install
# new updates.
autoUpdate: false

# If -autoUpdate- is set to false, EchoPet will notify certain
# players of new updates if they are available (if set to true).
checkForUpdates: true

# If true, Pets saved to a MySQL Database will override
# those saved to a file (Default and AutoSave Pets)
sql:
  overrideFile: true
  use: false
  host: localhost
  port: 3306
  database: EchoPet
  username: none
  password: none
petNames:
  My Pet: allow
petNamesRegexMatching: true
petNamesRegex:
- .*administrator.*: deny
stripDiacriticsFromNames: true

# Connects to Mojang session servers to attempt fto fix huma skins'
enableHumanSkinFixing: true

# Auto-load pets from last session
loadSavedPets: true

# When true, if -loadSavedPets-
# is set to false, Pets will
# still be loaded when
# players switch worlds
multiworldLoadOverride: true

# Send message that pet was loaded if -loadSavedPets- is true
sendLoadMessage: true

# For all data values forced, EchoPet will notify the player
# (if set to true).
sendForceMessage: true
worlds:
  world: true
  enableByDefault: true
  ASkyBlock: true
worldguard:
  regions:
    echopet: true
    allowByDefault: true
  regionEnterCheck: true
